'Working content', 'post_content' => '

WordPress Element Types

Blocks

Individual content elements (like text, images, or buttons) used to build a WordPress page or post, arranged directly within the block editor. These can range from a simple atomic element to custom blocks that could be a complex section layout.

Patterns

Pre-arranged and configured collections of blocks that can be inserted into a page or post to quickly create complex layouts, acting as reusable templates. Once a un-synced pattern has been added to a page, it loses any connect to the pattern. Updates to a pattern will not be applied to other instances. Patterns can exist as entries in the site's database or via code in a theme or plugin.

>
